word: Nov. 12, 1902: "The time is nearing when the great crisis in the history of the world will have come, when every movement in the government of God will be watched with intense interest and inexpressible apprehension. In quick succession the judgments of God will follow one another,--fire and flood and earthquakes, with war and bloodshed. Something great and decisive will soon of necessity take place." [THESE AND SEVERAL OTHER EXTRACTS OF LIKE NATURE WERE PUBLISHED IN AN ARTICLE BY MRS. WHITE IN THE REVIEW BEARING DATE OF JULY 5, 1906.]
